mapper.insert: insert into ABTests (TestName, VariantA, VariantB,ResultANum,ResultBNum) values (#{testName}, #{variantA}, #{variantB},0,0)
mapper.select: SELECT t.ABTestID, t.TestName, t.VariantA, t.VariantB, t.ResultANum, t.ResultBNum, t.CreatedAt, IF(r.ABResultID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS participated FROM ABTests t LEFT JOIN (SELECT ABResultID, ABTestID FROM ABResult WHERE UserID = #{userId}) r ON t.ABTestID = r.ABTestID ORDER BY participated ASC, t.CreatedAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ABResult (ABTestID, UserID, Pick) VALUES (#{abTestId}, #{userId}, #{pick})
mapper.update: UPDATE ABTests SET ResultANum = ResultANum + 1 WHERE ABTestID = #{abTestId}
UPDATE ABTests SET ResultBNum = ResultBNum + 1 WHERE ABTestID = #{abTestId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.ABTestID, t.TestName, t.VariantA, t.VariantB, t.ResultANum, t.ResultBNum, t.CreatedAt, IF(t.ResultANum > (SELECT COUNT(*) / 2 FROM Users WHERE DepartmentID = #{departmentId}) OR t.ResultBNum > (SELECT COUNT(*) / 2 FROM Users WHERE DepartmentID = #{departmentId}), 1, 0) AS participated FROM ABTests t WHERE (t.ResultANum > (SELECT COUNT(*) / 2 FROM Users WHERE DepartmentID = #{departmentId}) OR t.ResultBNum > (SELECT COUNT(*) / 2 FROM Users WHERE DepartmentID = #{departmentId})) ORDER BY t.CreatedAt DESC
